1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah say: 'Allah does not accept any prayer without purification, and He does not accept any charity from Ghulul

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَقْبَلُ اللَّهُ صَلاَةً بِغَيْرِ طُهُورِ
chapter.eng-name: Allah does not accept Salah (prayer) without purification
